prompt: The cart begins to roll. You have moments.

options.response: You catch the rear rail and haul yourself up.

options.text: Let it go and remain in Blackpine.
options.response: You stay in the square as the cart leaves. Another ride will cost you time.

prompt: A shadow moves in the tree line. Steel flashes. Choose quickly.

options.response: Your caution spots two attackers before they close.
You drive one attacker back at close range before the horse bolts past.

options.text: Shout for the driver to halt.
options.response: Your warning checks panic; both of you survive the bend.
You wait, then seize the right moment to steady cart and horse.

prompt: A horn sounds deeper in the pines. Three figures move toward the road workers.

options.text: Call workers back and form a defensive line.
options.response: Your discipline prevents bloodshed and the raiders withdraw.
You recover stolen tools but lose the trail in marsh ground.
No one is hurt, but rumors of weakness spread.
